name: Assassin's Creed: The Ezio Collection
overview: Assassin’s Creed: The Ezio Collection is a compilation of three remastered games in the Assassin’s Creed series : - Assassin's Creed II - Assassin's Creed: Brotherhood - Assassin's Creed: Revelations This edition is named after Ezio Auditore da Firenze, the protagonist for each of the three games. Next to the remastered content it includes all DLC for the game. The multiplayer segments of Brotherhood and Revelations are not maintained, so it also does not include any multiplayer DLC.
